sourcesContent: import { Box, Button, Container, Grid } from "@mui/material"; import AppDownloadButton, { Platform } from "components/app_download_button"; import DownloadButton from "components/download_button"; import ActionsHandler from "utilities/actions_handler"; import styles from 'utilities/global_styles.module.css' const HeaderSection = () => { return Open Community for every Student in Europe Everyone matters! We are here to provide value to every user inside Civitas Europe and help them achieve and experinece the most out of their univeristy journey. }; export default HeaderSection;
